隻.definition: classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc

隻字不提.definition: (idiom) to say not a single word about it

隻眼獨具.definition: see 獨具隻眼|独具只眼[du2 ju4 zhi1 yan3]

隻雞斗酒.definition: lit. a chicken and a bottle of wine (idiom); fig. ready to make an offering to the deceased, or to entertain guests
